args:
All right, bud! Time to power up Nina's
rupie magic, so let's get out there and
shout ourselves hoarse until everybody
in town comes runnin' to her shop!
Heck yeah! We'll get so many customers\nin this place that it brings down the\nhouse! Uh, metaphorically, of course.
I, uh... Look, I don't know if you need to\nattack it with QUITE so much fervor...

HEAR YE, HEAR YE! Get yer butts over to
the Nina Shop, where we got the finest
selection this side'a Alberia! If she ain't
stockin' it, you don't need it!

Hoy there, friend! Need some healin'?
One drop'a this killer salve will have any
wound healed up faster than ya can say
＂I love the Nina Shop more'n my own kids＂!
Well, I mean, I wouldn't try to reattach an\narm with it or nothin', but for cuts and\nscrapes, yer sittin' pretty as a jaybird!
Soooo...it's just medicine? Thanks,\nbut I've got plenty of that already.
What are you doing, beef-for-brains?!\nLemme show you how it's done!

Welcome one and all, to the Nina Shop,
where our goods are always affordable!
In fact, for a limited time only, everything
in the store is HALF PRICE!
That's right, friend! Why, you'd need a\nbroadsword to slash these prices further!\nNow if you'll just step this—
Luca, you dope! If ya drop the price on\neverything by half, poor Nina's gonna\nlose her shirt AND her pants!

Oh crap! I didn't even think about math!
Uhhh, sorry, folks! Got a bit ahead of
myself there! It's actually a 30-percent-off
sale! Or, um...maybe 20?
Do you even KNOW your prices?
Excuse me, but is the shopkeeper Nina\navailable at the moment?
You're the head of the merchant's guild!\nWhat can I do for you today?

Well, it's about your barkers. I'm afraid
they've stepped over the line from mere
exuberance to outright lies and being a
general nuisance to the community.
*sigh* I'm just glad the guild head noticed\nbefore you two did something stupid.\n...Er, or stupid-ER, I suppose.
False advertising and vague pricing\nare both slick roads down a long hill\nto losing your customer's confidence.
Had you two kept it up, my shop's\nreputation would've been in the gutter.
We're really sorry...but we know what we\ndid wrong now! Give us another chance!
Yeah! We wanna bust our humps to help\nmake yer rupie magic stronger!
Oh, enough already about that! I mean,\nthe rupie magic is just...
Uh...nothing. Anyway, I really don't need\nyour help with the shop any more.
*sigh* I should have expected you two\nchowderheads to cause nothing but\nheartburn for poor Nina.
Seems like our wisdom is needed!
Well, if it isn't the peddler and the rupie-\npinching mercenary from the Halidom!\nWhat are you two doing here?
Prince {player_name} asked us\nto drop by and help Ranzal and Luca\nout if... Well, if what happened happened.
He...did? Oh, boy. This whole thing is\nstarting to balloon out of control...
Er, you look distraught. Something wrong?
Oh, er, no! Nothing at all! Ha ha...haaaaa.

Aw, are you nervous? Not to worry!
Irfan and I put our heads together and
came up with a money-making scheme
that's SURE to succeed!
If you do exactly as we say, even Ranzal\nand Luca will be able to contribute to the\nstore's prosperity.
So what kind of plan is it? C'mon, tell us!\nWe'd do anything to help!
Aaaanything...? Good, because that's\ngoing to make this go a LOT faster.
So all we need from you two...is blood.
Mommy, look! What's everybody crowded\naround over there for?
Why, it looks like a street performance.\nLet's take a look, shall we?
Greetings to you all, fellow citizens!\nPlease, gather round! Don't be shy!
Behold as the greatest archer in the land,\nLuca, shoots this apple held in my hand!
Voila! The apple is split clean in two!
Oh dear! It seems I have pierced the hand\nof my good and true friend, Ranzal!
I'm afraid ya did, old chum...\nbut not to worry!
A wound like this ain't nothin' so long as I\ngot this medicine from the Nina Shop!\nWith just one application...
The wound is gone?! That's some truly\nincredible medicine!
Sure is, pal—and you good folks can buy\nall ya can hold over at the Nina Shop!
Hey! This isn't a street performance—\nit's an advertisement!
Who cares WHAT it is? That medicine\njust glued the man's hand back together!
Well, I suppose you are always\nroughhousing, so maybe we'll buy some\nto keep in the cabinet, just in case.
Boy, I tell you what, that plan Irfan and\nFrancesca came up with was a WINNER.
Who woulda ever thought to put fake blood\ninside an apple to make me seem injured?

As the days went by, Ranzal and Luca went all
about town giving product demonstrations to great
success, and customers began flooding the
Nina Shop in search of her famous medicine.
This place is hoppin' like a rabbit\nconvention in a sugar factory!
Nina's rupie magic is sure to get a\nhuge power boost now!
Er, you don't look very happy about\nall of this, Nina.
Oh boooy! I'm soooo happy! I can feel\nsuch awesome power emanating from\nall the rupies I'm earning!
Well, that's what's important—\nplus, now our debt's been repaid!
Welp, have a good one, Nina!\nWe're looking forward to having\nyour help again in the future!
Oh! I finally hit my goal! I think this means\nmy dream will be able to come true!
This happened faster than I thought—\nand there's no denying it's due to the\nbig influx of money that came in today.
Ranzal and Luca—and everyone else in\nthe Halidom—all worked so hard to help\nand support me.
Nina's rupie magic is sure to get a\nhuge power boost now!
Oh, geez. This is just making it harder\nto tell them the truth...
I just sort of blurted out the whole\n＂rupie magic＂ thing, but the truth is...
My power comes from this magical tool!
